title: Welcome, Mayor!
text: Your settlement awaits. Let's build a city from scratch! Start by placing some roads -- they connect your buildings and enable resource transport.

title: Build Roads
text: Select ROAD from the build menu and place a few tiles. Roads boost adjacent buildings and form the transport network for physical resources like wood, stone and food.

title: Feed Your People
text: Build a FARM near your roads. Farms on grass terrain produce bonus food (+20%). Place them next to lumber mills for a synergy bonus!

title: Attract Residents
text: Build a HUT next to a road. Residents need food and water. Without a road connection, buildings operate at only 30% efficiency!

title: Water Supply
text: Build a WATER TOWER to supply water through the pipe network. Residential buildings without water produce at only 60% efficiency!

title: Upgrade Buildings
text: Click a building to select it, then press U or click Upgrade. Higher levels produce more resources! Place workshops nearby for an upgrade discount.

title: Grow Your City
text: Check the city stats panel for level-up requirements. Meet them to unlock new buildings and bonuses! Each hex neighbor counts!

title: You're Ready!
text: Great job! You know the basics. Keep building, upgrading, and expanding. Aim for City Level 7 and beyond! Watch for events and manage your pressure index.
